commenter_a: I have advocated for helping the homeless for a decade but it has gotten out of hand over the last couple years...which is to be expected, given we've mostly ignored the problem. These folks belong in Wapato and Wapato needs to be converted into a mental health care site.. They commit crimes against society -- leaving garbage around is just a visible symptom but when folks aren't looking, they misbehave in more destructive ways. They need to be "rebooted," in the computer sense, not the kick-in-the-pants sense. Though some of them need that as well...
